title: Chris Doyle: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

video_links.name: Chris Doyle: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

brief_description: An interview with cinematographer Chris Doyle for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Chris Doyle is a cinematographer well known for his work on films directed by Wong Kar Wai, including “Chungking Express”, “In the Mood for Love” and “Happy Together”.
